name: My Little MMO Maker
description:
Have you ever wanted to create your own MMO? Well now you can! Design an endless world for players to judge your every move. Make money as players continue to play the game. Learn how to create new buildings and structures as your world grows. Unlock new features and playstyles for your players to enjoy.

This game was made in 7 days for the Kindred Community Game Jam following the theme "At the Beginning... There was Nothing". This game is brought to you by Michael and Janna Kocha, the husband and wife duo, that hosts the Kindred Community Game Jam! The game will be submitted to the jam, but will not be competing for any rewards.
